title: By the King a proclamation for better furnishing the nauy, and shipping of the realme, with able and skilfull mariners.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers  to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: Sheet 1 line 1 of text ends "Iames"; sheet 2, line 7 ends "entertaine".
"Giuen at Our Court at Saint Iames, the one and thirtieth day of March, in the first yeere Our Reigne of Great Britain, France, and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
